languages.text: {n}Судя по вялым движениям, молодой Волк жив, но не вполне в уме. На красивом лице его наливаются тяжелые и темные, словно грозовое облако, кровоподтеки.{/n}
{n}Judging by his sluggish movements, the young Wolf is alive, but not entirely lucid. A storm cloud of heavy bruising is spreading across his handsome face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Судя по вялым движениям, молодой Волк жив, но не вполне в уме. На красивом лице его наливаются тяжелые и темные, словно грозовое облако, кровоподтеки.{/n}

traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: {n}Judging by his sluggish movements, the young Wolf is alive, but not entirely lucid. A storm cloud of heavy bruising is spreading across his handsome face.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}从他迟钝的动作来看，这位年轻的野狼还活着，但并没有完全清醒过来。他英俊的脸上已经泛起了一大片严重的淤伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his sluggish movements, the young Wolf is alive, but not entirely lucid. A storm cloud of heavy bruising is spreading across his handsome face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}从他迟钝的动作来看，这位年轻的野狼还活着，但并没有完全清醒过来。他英俊的脸上已经泛起了一大片严重的淤伤。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}緩慢な動きをしていることから、この若い狼は息があるものの、完全に頭が冴えているわけではない。重い打撲痕が暗雲のように、ハルブラントの端正な顔中に広がっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his sluggish movements, the young Wolf is alive, but not entirely lucid. A storm cloud of heavy bruising is spreading across his handsome face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}緩慢な動きをしていることから、この若い狼は息があるものの、完全に頭が冴えているわけではない。重い打撲痕が暗雲のように、ハルブラントの端正な顔中に広がっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}A juzgar por sus torpes movimientos, el Lobo joven está vivo, pero no del todo lúcido. Una nube de graves rasguños se extiende por su apuesto rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his sluggish movements, the young Wolf is alive, but not entirely lucid. A storm cloud of heavy bruising is spreading across his handsome face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A juzgar por sus torpes movimientos, el Lobo joven está vivo, pero no del todo lúcido. Una nube de graves rasguños se extiende por su apuesto rostro.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}À en juger par la lenteur de ses mouvements, le jeune Loup est vivant, mais pas tout à fait lucide. Son beau visage se couvre peu à peu d'une multitude d'ecchymoses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his sluggish movements, the young Wolf is alive, but not entirely lucid. A storm cloud of heavy bruising is spreading across his handsome face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À en juger par la lenteur de ses mouvements, le jeune Loup est vivant, mais pas tout à fait lucide. Son beau visage se couvre peu à peu d'une multitude d'ecchymoses.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}Den trägen Bewegungen nach zu urteilen, ist der junge Wolf am Leben, aber nicht ganz bei sich. Die Sturmwolke eines großen Blutergusses breitet sich auf seinem hübschen Gesicht aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his sluggish movements, the young Wolf is alive, but not entirely lucid. A storm cloud of heavy bruising is spreading across his handsome face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Den trägen Bewegungen nach zu urteilen, ist der junge Wolf am Leben, aber nicht ganz bei sich. Die Sturmwolke eines großen Blutergusses breitet sich auf seinem hübschen Gesicht aus.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}Hantal hareketlerine bakılırsa Kurt hayatta ama tam olarak kendinde değil. Ağır yaralardan oluşan bir fırtına bulutu, yakışıklı yüzüne yayılıyor.{/n}
